description: a(n) = (F(6n+5) - F(6n+1))/4 = (F(6n+4) + F(6n+2))/4, where F=A000045 (the Fibonacci sequence).
comments: x(n) := 2*a(n) and y(n) := A007805(n), n >= 0, give all the positive solutions of the Pell equation x^2 - 5*y^2 = -1.The Gregory V. Richardson formula follows from this. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 20 2013
